mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UserInfo( openId, userName, userAvatar, createTime, phone, phoneType, token, privilegeId ) VALUES( #{openId}, #{userName}, #{userAvatar}, #{createTime}, #{phone}, #{phoneType}, #{token}, #{privilegeId} );

( #{item.openId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.leaveType}, #{item.leaveCase}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime} )

INSERT INTO UserDrug(openId, createTime, drugUuid, eatTime, drugName, eatMorning, eatNoon, eatNight, eatMorningNum, eatNoonNum, eatNightNum, timeMorning, timeNoon, timeNight, eatDays, endTime, drugPrice, manufacturer) VALUES (#{openId}, #{createTime}, #{drugUuid}, #{eatTime}, #{drugName}, #{eatMorning}, #{eatNoon}, #{eatNight}, #{eatMorningNum}, #{eatNoonNum}, #{eatNightNum}, #{timeMorning}, #{timeNoon}, #{timeNight}, #{eatDays}, #{endTime}, #{drugPrice}, #{manufacturer})
